title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, August 30, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss writes to his wife, describing a Sunday in camp, the sermon, and music and dancing entertainment. He gives his wife his thoughts on education/religious training for the children.
keywords: Desertion/Leave, Church/Religious Activity, Camp Life, Arts/Leisure, Military Authority, Women, Home Front, American Civil War
